info.title: Read information about a menu button in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnMenuButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the menu button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the menu button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#menubutton1').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Actions' menu button, read information about the menu button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Actions' menu button, read information about the menu button.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
